column1: You did doctor and the school. Right?
did you think about the use of virtual reality or these headsets and the story, what part kind of stood out to you?
All of us are in the classroom. It's like everything!
What kinds of problems might VR create?
maybe your parents should be worried about screen time.
that makes sense. Who do you think should decide which VR experiences are good or bad for children? parents teachers...

When VR makers are creating these virtual reality experiences for children and families what are things that you really liked or you really didn't like what they should keep in mind when they're creating more
What did you like best about the VR that you tried?
I like the part that a guy shown in there say hi...
Well, thank you so much for your time. We appreciate it.
